# Before You Start

Discord Trivia requires basic knowledge of NodeJS and Discord.JS. This guide assumes that you have a Discord client with working commands. If you need to setup a Discord client with Discord.JS, click here for an in-depth guide on how to get started then come back here once you're ready.

Furthermore, the latest stable versions of both NodeJS and Discord.JS are recommended.
